_source.text: Actually I did not think he sang bad...I wasn't sure why they picked on him so much....because he sang better than other people they put through....but when he came out of the room, his mom tried to hug him, and he said "don't touch me", and pushed her away.

text: sang **better** **than** other people they put through....but when he came out of the room, his mom tried to
hug him, and he said "don't **touch** me", and pushed her **away**.
Actually I did not think he sang bad...I wasn't sure why they picked on him so much....**because** he
